# Introduction

This vignette provides examples of user authentication workflows using the `igniteR` package.

# Signing Up a New User

```r
# Create a new user account
signUpWithPassword("user@example.com", "securepassword123")
```

# Signing In

```r
# Authenticate an existing user
auth <- signInWithPassword("user@example.com", "securepassword123")
print(auth$idToken)
```

# Retrieving User Data

```r
# Get user profile information
user_data <- getUserData(auth$idToken)
print(user_data$email)
```

# Password Reset

```r
# Send a password reset email
resetPassword("user@example.com")
```

# Updating User Profile

```r
# Update profile
updateProfile(
  idToken = auth$idToken,
  displayName = "Updated Name",
  photoUrl = "https://example.com/photo.jpg"
)
